argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumclOLD.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumclOLD.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumclOLD.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsumclOLD.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 5 |  | gsumclOLD.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 6 |  | gsumclOLD.w | |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | gsumf1oOLD.h | |- ( ph -> H : C -1-1-onto-> A ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` G ) = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 9 |  | #P_cmnmnd | |- ( G e. CMnd -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 11 | 1, 8, 3, 5 | #P_cntzcmnf | |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` ran F ) ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 8, 10, 4, 5, 11, 6, 7 | #P_gsumzf1oOLD | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum ( F o. H ) ) ) |
